channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: The great decoupling of labor and capital
item.description:
Their most recent incremental $100 Billion. But their most recent $100 Billion. While historically they took 200k to 400k employees for their incremental $100 Billion revenues, they added their last $200 Billion revenue with only 36k incremental employees.

Read more

item.title: Simple trick to increase coverage: Lying to users about signal strength
